trans-unit.source: Represents information about a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta le informazioni su un <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain identifying information for an initialized recognition engine using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object.
trans-unit.target: È possibile ottenere le informazioni di identificazione per un motore di riconoscimento inizializzato con <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>oggetto o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>oggetto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The information returned in instances of RecognizerInfo obtained from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> is determined by the settings in the **Speech Properties** member of the **Control Panel**.
trans-unit.target: Le informazioni restituite nelle istanze di RecognizerInfo ottenuto da un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>è determinato dalle impostazioni di **proprietà di riconoscimento vocale** membro del **Pannello di controllo**.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: You can use instances of RecognizerInfo to construct a specific configuration of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare le istanze di RecognizerInfo per costruire una specifica configurazione di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>utilizzando il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29>costruttore.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The static method <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> returns a list of all available <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> configurations as RecognizerInfo instances.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo statico <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>restituisce un elenco di tutti disponibili <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>configurazioni come istanze RecognizerInfo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets additional information about a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene informazioni aggiuntive un <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> containing information about the configuration of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un'istanza di <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> contenente informazioni sulla configurazione di un <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the culture supported by a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le impostazioni cultura supportate da un <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object can include the name of the culture, the associated language, the country/region, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>oggetto può includere il nome della lingua, la lingua associata, il paese/area geografica, il calendario usato e come formattare le date e ordinamento delle stringhe.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the culture supported by a given <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce informazioni sulle impostazioni cultura supportate da un determinato <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la descrizione di un <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that describes the configuration for a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> che descrive la configurazione per uno specifico <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the `RecognizerInfo` object.
trans-unit.target: Elimina il `RecognizerInfo` oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'identificatore di un <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The identifier returned by the Id property is the same as the token name of the recognition engine in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore restituito dalla proprietà Id è lo stesso come il nome del token del motore di riconoscimento del Registro di sistema.

trans-unit.source: Returns the identifier for a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'identificatore per uno specifico <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Gets the friendly name of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome descrittivo di un <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Returns the friendly name for a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il nome descrittivo per uno specifico <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio formats supported by a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i formati audio supportati da un <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of audio formats supported by a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un elenco di formati audio supportati da uno specifico <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> istanza.
